article_title: 15 percent of Merced County adults continue without health insurance, data show
article_text:
03:25

Merced County Sheriff's Department investigating use of metal spears during bloodless bullfighting in Stevinson

article_metadata.title: 15 percent of Merced County adults continue without health insurance, data show | The Merced Sun-Star

og.description: More California residents than ever are covered by health insurance, according to recent reports. And while Merced County has seen its percentage of uninsured fall to a new low, that rate has hit a plateau that experts say will be hard to move past.
